articles.title: FIFA reviews chef’s ‘undue access’ to hold World Cup trophy
articles.description: The chef, who is known as Salt Bae and is regularly seen with FIFA president Gianni Infantino, mingled with Argentina players and posed for photos after their victory over France in an epic game on Sunday in Qatar.
articles.content:
FIFA is taking “appropriate internal action” to address breaches of World Cup protocol by a celebrity chef who held the gold trophy on the field, soccer’s governing body said Thursday.
The chef, who is known as Salt Bae and is regularly seen with FIF... [1011 chars]

articles.title: GRAINS-Soybeans face weekly decline on improved Argentina weather
articles.description: SINGAPORE, Dec 23 (Reuters) - Chicago soybean futures ticked higher on Friday, but the market was set for a weekly loss as forecasts of rains in drought-hit Argentina's farm belt eased supply concerns.Wheat firmed, with the market on track to end the week on a positive note as extremely cold weather across the U.S.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE, Dec 23 (Reuters) - Chicago soybean futures ticked higher on Friday, but the market was set for a weekly loss as forecasts of rains in drought-hit Argentina's farm belt eased supply concerns.

articles.title: World Cup: Fifa probe celebrity chef Salt Bae's 'undue access' at final
articles.description:
He was pictured holding and kissing the trophy after Argentina beat France.
Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
LONDON - Fifa are investigating how celebrity chef Salt Bae gained “undue access” to the pitch after the World Cup final where he enthusiastically posed for photos with surprised Argentina players including a bemused and irritated Lionel Messi.

articles.title: Fifa investigating how chef Salt Bae got on to World Cup final pitch
articles.description: Influencer and restaurateur Nusret Gökçe seen kissing trophy and joining Argentina’s celebrations in defiance of strict rules on access
articles.content:
Fifa has launched an investigation into how social media influencer chef and restaurateur Salt Bae and others got access to the pitch after the World Cup final in Qatar.
